title: E&C Announces Hearing on Upgrading America’s Drinking Water Infrastructure

Pallone Questions Vaping Companies Over Marketing of Synthetic Nicotine Products to Teens
summary: Pallone wrote to four leading vaping companies that sell synthetic nicotine products to request information regarding the health and safety of their products.

title: E&C Democrats Outline Priorities on Implementation of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law’s Broadband Investments

title: E&C Leaders Demand Answers from Utility Companies on Alarmingly High Shutoff Rates During COVID-19 Pandemic
summary: Pallone, Rush, and DeGette demand answers from six utility companies on alarmingly high shutoff rates during the COVID-19 pandemic.
